title: Ranji Trophy 2015, Group A: Bengal extend lead against Delhi on Day 3
text: An exceptional show in the on-going Ranji Trophy and the inconsistent performances of some of the current Indian seamers might influence national selectors to include Ishant Sharma in the squad for the last two ODIs against South Africa.
